00239 inline CVector2d CAffine2d::GetApply(const CVector2d& position) const
00240 {
00241        CVector2d result;
00242        m_deformMatrix.GetMultiplied(position, result);
00243 
00244        return result + m_translation;
00245 }
00246 
00247 
00248 inline void CAffine2d::GetApply(const CVector2d& position, CVector2d& result) const
00249 {
00250        m_deformMatrix.GetMultiplied(position, result);
00251        result += m_translation;
00252 }
00253

00260 
00261        return retVal;
00262 }

00271 inline CAffine2d CAffine2d::GetTranslated(const CVector2d& vector) const
00272 {
00273        return CAffine2d(m_deformMatrix, m_translation + vector);
00274 }
00275 
00276 
00277 inline void CAffine2d::GetTranslated(const CVector2d& vector, CAffine2d& result) const
00278 {
00279        result.GetDeformMatrixRef() = m_deformMatrix;
00280        result.GetTranslationRef() = m_translation + vector;
00281 }

00312 inline bool CAffine2d::operator==(const CAffine2d& transform) const
00313 {
00314        return (m_translation == transform.m_translation) && (m_deformMatrix == transform.m_deformMatrix);
00315 }
00316 
00317 
00318 inline bool CAffine2d::operator!=(const CAffine2d& transform) const
00319 {
00320        return (m_translation != transform.m_translation) || (m_deformMatrix != transform.m_deformMatrix);
00321 }
